svt_i2c_master_monitor Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_i2c_master_monitor:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This class is Monitor Receiver for I2C Master The events available at the master monitor are as follows :

  • EVENT_START_CONDITION: signals START condition from master
  • EVENT_STOP_CONDITION : signals STOP condition from master
  • EVENT_ACK_RECEIVED : signals receiving ACK on bus
  • EVENT_NACK_RECEIVED : signals receiving NACK on bus
  • EVENT_START_BYTE : signals START BYTE from master
  • EVENT_GEN_CALL : signals GENERAL CALL command from master
  • EVENT_SLAVE_ADD_7_B : signals 7-bit slave address from master
  • EVENT_SLAVE_ADD_10_B : signals 10-bit slave address from master
  • EVENT_GET_PACKET : signals receiving a data byte on bus
  • EVENT_REPEATED_START_CONDITION : signals REPEATED START condition

Member Attribute Documentation

 uvm_analysis_port  attribute
 svt_i2c_master_monitor::data_observed_port

Analysis Port which collects data observed on bus. Monitor writes the response object to this analysis port immediately after it observes data on the bus, instead of waiting for the complete transaction to appear on the bus.

 bit  attribute
 svt_i2c_master_monitor::enable_wrapper_connection_check

 svt_i2c_master_monitor::xact_observed_port
